item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Its time  to squeel like a pygg and get a mouth full of Hillbilly River water !!!!

Note: We can not paddle white water with our kind of kayaks so this event INTRODUCES you to white water in craft made for it.

JUNE 24 IS NOW FULLY CONFIRMED AND **FRANK** WAS REQUESTED AS OUR GUIDE for the first 6-8 of us !  (Those that have joined us before ;; "YOU KNOW WHAT THAT MEANS") !

" Hillbilly Frank does not have any teeth left--- He will tell you and SHOW you why" ...

With Frank----> For a first timer on this river its an even more memorable trip since we do a few extra things when feasible that the other guides are even scared to try.

In Frank's Boat: al-r, Kat, Alex,  Pat, Jay, 3 more ??

The other boats and HILLBILLY guids are fine also so you will be in good company, besides we pass each other along the way..etc...

 

PLEASE CALL CRABAPPEL WW  Tours to pay Up and reserve with them using:

( AL -R S GROUP "June 24 Monore Bridge" ) as the reference..

For RESERVATIONS. Please give us a call 7 days a week at 1-800-553-7238 or send us an  e-mail . Sincerely, The Peabody & The Mooney Families

http://www.crabapplewhitewater.com/

ok SO its $ 95.00 pp

The above info is about all you really need to know.

For entertainment -- you can read the info below:.

 

XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

 

Janice from the Hartford Hiking group also listed the event same day same time...so it will be a big community going, . its really a good time... You can reserve with her boat also if you want if mine is full.

-------------------------------------------------------

Last Years Pics & Comments: http://www.meetup.com/HCR-SK/events/15291645/

http://www.meetup.com/HCR-SK/photos/2082051/

All the other trips are $ 110.00. so keep that in mind...besides i like the cold rush of water on my HUNKY SEXY body..(It also cools me down if im near some "Brown Eyes" ok maybe other colors too) ... it gets you in shape for the paddling season.. remember we do not want any whimps paddling with us on the ocean or even rivers, they become shark food...

WE ARE KAYAKERS AND SHOULD BE ABLE TO HANDLE THIS RIVER WATER TEMPERATURE since we paddle on cold rivers and the ocean earlier in the season anyway.  NO  WHIMPS..

A wetsuit and water sneakers (or booties) is recommended since you will be wet the entire time, if you do not have one -- CRABAPPEL rents them to you right on site. I think its about 10+ bucks or something ?

a DRY SUIT is NOT recommended since you will have to pee in it at some point and there is no real stopping, so you well get PISS WET one way or the other and smell bad at the end..

In a wet suit -- its  a warm PEE relief --no one knows except you as you fill the raft !  (cool it with the Vitimines in the morning, the yellow color will give you away) maybe seeing your smile of relief will clue in someone though of what just happened....

http://www.crabapplewhitewater.com/massachusetts/deerfield-monroe_bridge_schedule.shtml

-------

Yes this is the "ONLY" White Water event i plan to list and most expensive  event of the year. So save up those dollars over the next few days.

-------

BELOW ARE THE RAFTING GUIDES YOU MIGHT BOND & MEAT with.

FOR THE "SINGLE" LADIES:  Choose the hunky man you like best !!!! (they are all in their late 20's and Early 30's.

Here is your chance to not be lonely and single any more, Oh YESSSS -- you will have a good genetic stock for your many - many children also.

(SEE THE CHILD PICTURE BELOW the THREE FATHERS to highlight the possible outcomes and combinations you can get )..

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

<~~ Top Quality GENETIC MATERIAL will make for the best babies in the county.

Can you pick out the dominant father of the three above ??? Hmm might be un-Stable Horse had some influence here too....

 

County Pig Wrestling champ and State Corn Cob Spitting contestant *Momma* Incubated this kid for over 21 months..(longer than the Boons Farm Wine). look at what you can get if the genetic  combination is right.

 

Its already a Nose & Banjo Picken prodigidy that will have you dancing like there were Rattle Snakes biting your Ankles and  Bare Ass.

 

 

 

 

 

I am listing this particular event because its an all day adventure and it includes everything from the full rafting with Frank as our raft guide (some of yo know we can do things that other guids can't or won't do) like riding the BULL earlier on in the trip.

Included is also The bus trip to and from the ACTUAL rafting put ins and take outs, and remember there is a INCLUDED HILLBILLY PIGG or other carcus ROAST -- Chainsaw trimmed "Barbie q Lunch" right after made from Grade C body Parts. (Ya "C" the food and ya Eat it)...or else you meet with Leather Face TOMMY the butcher in the kitchen to help out for the next meal.

Here is our bus that transports you to the PUT IN SPOT.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

There may even be some BANJO PLAYING at the event by the best in the South..

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Carpooling will be discussed with those actually going and that will be a few days prior to the event day.

I know money is tight for everyone, that is why i have tried to present events that save as much as possible, 5 here 5 there, 20, on and on is saved..so in effect this event is paid for by saving in other areas (COST BALANCED) because we have Pot Lucks instead of the awful restaurant stops afterward and no fee parking...

 

UPDATE:

WATER AND AIR TEMPS ARE HIGH ENOUGH AND WET SUITS ARE AVAILABLE IF YOU DESIRE THEM from crabappel on site.

:  " June 24" <~~~~~~ DEERFIELD RIVER MONROE BRIDGE SECTION EVENT




The DILLIVERANCE River on the Marlyn Monroe Bridge Section will have you

"SQUEELING IN DELIGHT LIKE A PYGG" .

 

 

 

 

Its the Best whitewater in southern New England. These are some of the first scheduled dam releases of 2012 on the exciting Class III-VI stretch of river. Take advantage of the early season price - $95pp. Save $15pp.


Last years trip in Vermont: http://www.meetup.com/Hartford-County-Rivers-To-Shore-Area-Kayakers-CT/events/12205657/

Please....Im only interested in hearing from people that are adventurous, in good mental and physical shape who are looking forward to an enjoyable social event ( if 15 year olds allowed you will do fine) but NO COMPLAINING WHIMPS allowed on this trip..

--------------------------------------------------------

Some of the info on this particular river area:

A COMMENT FROM ONE OF the GUIDES:

HOWDY FOLKS : On This River yous gonna be on da-> Marilyn Monroe Suicide Bridge Section.

You will see Big White Wet and Wild Water Excitement above the Berkinstocks in this area.

 

I lost my TEETH and virginity here and really love it.... Yeeee Hawaaaa !

 

The Marylin Monroe Suicide Bridge trip is full of big Killer waves and fast wild whitewater action that will blow your skirts up into the wind and have you piss your pants many times over (if you are even wearing them on this kind of trip)  !

Note: I dont wear any pants any more, I am hairy as a black bear below my Red Neck!

 

Junior usually goes down this river fully NAKED too while standing up in the front of the boat like a Ford Pick Up Truck hood ornament and has earned his reputation as best target shooter HillBilly by PEEING on the FISHERMEN's face with a perfect mouth shot -- so cheer him on with every successful hosing..

WE DO NOT want FISHING HOOKS IN THE RAFTS, SO HELP OUT JUNIOR BY WACKING THE fishermen HE MISSES WITH YOUR PADDLE WHILE he RE CHARGING HIS BELLY WITH MOONSHINE FOR THE NEXT HOSING.

------------------------------------------------------------

The fun and torture starts right below the Marylin Monroe Suicide Bridge and the God Damn DAM.

As you are thrown into the refreshing water with Class II warm-up rapids ( you will be cold until the Libido increases)  Then its warm up to your water spanking Paddle Good Buddy and we head to a stretch of bigger, Class III HUMPS, Yes its just like the Bumps and drops just like Marilin Monroe had.

You will enjoy the Orgasm Rush of challenges such as "Devil's Odds against your sole and life" and "Landslide into the pleasure of HELL."

Along the way our expert guides will take time to play and work the river in a "surfing hole of endless Pools with depths of Delight" or two.

KEEP YOUR MOUTH CLOSED --Don't swallow the water since the fishermen pee in the river and Juniour takes a bath in it, the picture below shows why.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Each rapid gets more excitingly  scary as the trip builds toward the final most difficult and orgasmic rapids of the day, "Dragon's Ripping and Biting Tooth from BUBBA" (its the kids father's monument now) and the Arnold Ziffel Pitch Fork which will Poke you into "The Terminator Pork Sausage Squeeze and Bite rapid."

 

 

 

Above is the Kid who's father has a memorial dedicated to his BIG Teeth right in the middle of the RIVER.

BUBBA was Beaver Chewing on a 200 year old oak tree and it fell in the water. As the tree blocked the flow of the whole river current - BUBBA then  gulped too much water because he got his teeth stuck under the tree as he tried to get out of the flow.

 

 

POOR BUBBA ! Rest in Peas. And the retrieved body parts in the Corn FIELD too.

 

These rapids require precise maneuvering by your guide with strong spanking and paddling by each rafter or else you will become body parts along the shore or you will be like a un-cooked sausage that has burst littering the pristine waterways.

Good runs through these Class IV rapids climax with a big wet drenching orgasm of waves and an awesome day of whitewater action way up above the Berkenstocks giving you a smile that you need.

A Tasty Sizzeling Smoked Body Part Cookout is included back in "Charlie on a Mount" on a smoking grille , you will see and smell the parts cooking as we arrive...MMMMmmm MMMMmm Good.. You will say..."We will never go hungry again".

The Grill Master is below holding the grilling fork in hand yelling:

"COME AND GIT YOU WIGGELIN GRUBs , thay hot and steamy  !!!"

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

CornFed Momma "THE COOK's Wife" will serve you up you meal on her favourite trash can lids

to us as soon as she gets out of the Kayk full of her damm KFC chicken.

:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Only the Finger licking Good parts is also left if you like the boney option, she ate the meat and has the bones left for you to crunch on..

al-r

For RESERVATIONS. Please give us a call 7 days a week at 1-800-553-7238 or send us an  e-mail . Sincerely, The Peabody & The Mooney Families

http://www.crabapplewhitewater.com/

Driving directions and other info will be e mailed to you by Crabappel once you have set up your reso with them.

 

Your reservation will look like:

Al- R 

xxx Silas Deane Hwy 

Wethersfield CT  06109-1731 

Crab Apple Whitewater, Inc.
3 Lake Moxie Rd 
The Forks, Maine 04985 
1-800-553-RAFT(7238) 
info@crabapplewhitewater.com Ticket #54888
Status:Invoice 
Jan 30, 2012

Thank you for your reservation with Crab Apple Whitewater, Inc.
Please review the cancellation and refund policy, details and additional information below regarding your trip(s):

Activities

FROM DATE TO DATE ACTIVITY DESCRIPTION CHARGES 06/24/2012 06/24/2012 DEERFIELD RIVER-MONROE BRIDGE
09:30AM
Includes Hearty BBQ Lunch on 06/24/2012 1 ADULT 95.00 95.00   Activities Total 95.00

Payment Information

PAYMENT DATE AMOUNT PAYOR NAME METHOD 01/30/2012 95.00 ALFRED REIGINS P Charges Summary   Total Charges 95.00                     Sub Total 95.00   Payments Made 95.00   Balance 0.00

Important Information

Rafting Liability Waiver Directions to Massachusetts Base Monroe Bridge Section Trip Itinerary & What to Bring Local Lodging Options The Fine Print


CANCELLATION AND REFUND POLICY

If written cancellation is received by Crab Apple Whitewater, Inc. 60 days prior to the activity date, a full refund less $10pp will be given. Cancellations made within 60 days of the activity date are non-refundable. Refunds will not be given for no shows. We encourage you to find a replacement. Monies forfeited may not be applied to any balances that may be due. If Crab Apple Whitewater Inc. cancels an activity a full refund or rain check will be given. Raft trips will not be cancelled due to weather unless Crab Apple deems that travel to the river from base camps or safety on the river will be compromised. Cancellations would be decided the morning of a trip at Crab Apple and full refunds issued.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the Crabappel Building, I will be wearing my Orange PYGG Hunting Hat.

item.name: JUN 24 -PADDLE FASTER-I HEAR BANJOS PLAYING @ DILLIVERANCE RIV Marlyn MONROE Brg
